text:
FetLife (https://fetlife.com) | REMOTE | Product Designer

More about FetLife: Largest kinky social network - Over 6 million members and growing every day - We grew 100% by word-of-mouth - A top 600 website in most English speaking countries - Serve over a couple of billion requests a month

More info about the role: https://weworkremotely.com/jobs/5823-product-designer
